posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: June 1, 2014 at 10:45 AM#6unfortunately, in the store syntax, name is a second argument to the store function, name is defined as what comes after the store destination (cue-number in this case), so you cannot exclude the store-destination (number) without excluding the name, otherwise the name will be interpreted as the first argument - the destination.I your selected executor is a main sequence, always located at e.g. exec 15, you could provide theexecutoras the store destination instead,Store Executor 15 Fade (time?) ("Name?")
